name: Twitter - DarkText/Light Themes
description:
This is for themes with light backgrounds.
I would not recommend it for darker background themes.
It darkens the text and highlights some tweet info.
I find that the default coloring tends to dull the mind.
additional_info:
5/29/2011 - added copyright, promos, profiles, and other misc.
9/29/2012 - Initial updates (long overdue) for twitter facelift
9/30/2012 - added "retweeted"
